mentions.context: In the same spirit, Fujiwara et al. (2002) developed a piece of software named PICASSO for automatic 3D caricature generation.
There was no time limit for any of the two parts, and the evaluation was conducted online using the PsyToolkit software (Stoet, 2010(Stoet, , 2017)).
